title: Analysis of Greek Kindergarten Writing Education Policies: A Comparative Study of Functional Approaches and Structural Objectives

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of language education policy, document analysis methods, and overview of EU language policies
context.additional_context: Project-based learning course analyzing discrepancies between Greece's official kindergarten writing education policy and actual classroom design. Learners apply document analysis techniques to evaluate alignment with EU communication-focused language policies, exploring practical implications for language policy design

learning_goals: Learners can design an analytical framework distinguishing functional and structural goals in Greek kindergarten writing education policy documents.
Learners can conduct document-based content analysis on 76 instructional design cases and statistically compare the frequency of functional/structural goals.
Learners can write a report evaluating the alignment level of analysis results with EU language policies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
